ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK(Account.Netsuite_Internal_ID__c), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Activated"), OR( (Account.Subsidiary_lookup__r.Name = "Bynder LLC" && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingCountryCode,"US"))), (Account.Subsidiary_lookup__r.Name = "Bynder Ltd." && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingCountryCode,"GB"))), (Account.Subsidiary_lookup__r.Name = "Bynder Software FZ-LLC" && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingCountryCode,"AE"))), (Account.Subsidiary_lookup__r.Name = "Bynder B.V." && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingCountryCode,"NL"))) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Tax issues for customers where country doesn't match subsidiary country. Contact Aba√≠.
